output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

1. Create a Twitter Developer app
2. Create a Twitter account for your bot
3. Authenticate the Twitter bot account with your app 
4. Set up GitHub actions to tweet out regularly


```{r}
library(rvest)


panels <- read_html("https://www.riddles.com/riddle-of-the-day") %>% 
  html_nodes(".panel")  


riddle <- panels %>% 
  html_nodes(".orange_dk_span") %>% 
  html_text() %>% 
  .[1]

riddle_link <- panels %>% 
  html_nodes(".panel-heading")%>% 
  html_nodes("a") %>% 
  html_attr("href") %>% 
  paste0("https://www.riddles.com", .) %>% 
  .[1]
  

```
